display_long_description:
Blast Arena VR 
Welcome to Blast Arena VR — a high-octane futuristic sci-fi shooting arena where neon lights, holograms, and high-tech targets surround you in a visually stunning battleground.

Wield dual energy blasters and step into an adrenaline-charged VR experience where speed, accuracy, and reflexes define your survival. Every corner of the arena pulses with neon glow, every shot lights up the future.

🎯 Game Modes
Training Mode – Sharpen your aim and reaction time in a sci-fi simulation chamber.
Master your blasters and track targets in a controlled neon arena before stepping into the real fight.

Time Battle – The clock is ticking. Targets appear fast and furious — the more you destroy, the higher your score. Push your limits and chase the top spot.

🚀 Features
Dual Energy Blasters – Double the firepower, double the fun.

Immersive Sci-Fi Arena – Holographic targets, glowing platforms, and sleek futuristic design.

Dynamic Difficulty – From calm precision training to high-speed chaos.

4-Minute Intense Rounds – Perfect bursts of action to keep you hooked.

Optimized for Quest 2, 3, and Pro

Neon-Soaked Atmosphere – A visual feast of lights and effects that bring the arena to life.

💥 The future of VR shooting is here. Train hard, aim sharp, and dominate the Blast Arena.
Your reflexes are your greatest weapon — lock in, power up, and blast away!
